attributes.additional_details:
More than 70 wildfires have broken out in the past week in provinces on Turkey’s Aegean and Mediterranean coasts as well as the inland areas. There are many images showing the devastation caused by the deadly fires that continue to burn. Death toll currently seems to be at 8 but this is likely to go up with many more injuries. People are losing their homes and livelihoods. 

Turkey needs help! I am asking you all to sign this petition and share it with your contacts in the name of humanity.
attributes.background:
At present, Turkey is battling major wildfires without adequate support and firefighting equipment. They are not able to fight this alone! 

We would like government to send help to preserve life and wildlife!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
